entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 9:10 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:10 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
